mapper.insert: insert into users(name, email, password, zipcode, address, telephone) values(#{name},#{email},#{password},#{zipcode},#{address},#{telephone});
insert into questions(name, email, password, zipcode, address, telephone) values(#{name},#{email},#{password},#{zipcode},#{address},#{telephone});
mapper.select: select * from users where email=#{email} and password=#{password};
